DESCRIPTION: Craft cards are only obtainable through Synthesis and will always Exhaust.
Consume Materials to create powerful Crafts. Your Element Value will increase according to the Materials consumed.
Tactics Level will increase for every skill played up to 5 and resets every turn by default.
Chain will increase for every attack played up to 5 and resets every turn.
Materials are used in Synthesis and can only be gathered through certain cards.

Raising your Element Value will have special effects. NL #yFire: Deal damage at the end of your turn. NL #yIce: Gain Block at the end of your turn. NL #yLightning: Periodically gain Energy. NL #yWind: Periodically draw a card.
Stars are #b0 cost Attack cards which Exhaust.
Creativity adds additional damage to Crafts.
